          {% set company_shown = talk.speakers|map(attribute='company')|join('') %}
          {% set twitter_shown = talk.speakers|map(attribute='twitter')|join('') %}
          {% for speaker in talk.speakers %}

            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}

            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}

          {% for speaker in talk.speakers %}

            {% endif %}
